Replace.Text: Three tile natural wonder. It provides +6 [ICON_Science] Science, and +3 [ICON_Science] Science to adjacent tiles. Units that enter it are teleported to an ocean far away, but naval units that do so earn the ability 'Mysterious Currents' (+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement).
Four tile natural wonder. It provides +2 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Production] Production, and +2 [ICON_Science] Science.

Two tile natural wonder. It appears with Cliffs adjacent to water and provides +2 [ICON_Food] Food, +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold, +3 [ICON_Culture] Culture. Also provides +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture to adjacent tiles. Improvements cannot be placed on it.

One tile natural wonder. It provides +2 [ICON_Food] Food and +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith, and Fresh Water. Land combat units that enter the tile receive the ability 'Water of Life' (+10 HP healing in any territory).

Three tile natural wonder. It provides +3 [ICON_Production] Production and +4 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.

Two tile natural wonder. It can be found on coastal terrain and provides +3 [ICON_Food] Food, +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold, and +3 [ICON_Science] Science. Also provides major adjacency bonus to Campus district.

Two tile natural wonder. It can be found on coastal terrain and provides +3 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 [ICON_Production] Production, and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. +15 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending in this tile.
One tile impassable natural wonder. Provides +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold to adjacent tiles, and Fresh Water. +50% [ICON_Production] Production when producing wonders and districts in adjacent tiles.

Two tile natural wonder. It appears as a Lake and provides +1 [ICON_Production] Production, +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold, and +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture. Also provides +4 appeal, instead of the usual +2 appeal to adjacent tiles. Does not provide Fresh Water.
Three tile impassable natural wonder. Provides +1 [ICON_Production] Production to adjacent tiles. Naval combat units that enter adjacent plots for the first time are granted their next promotion.

One tile impassable natural wonder. It appears as a Volcano and provides +2 [ICON_Food] Food to adjacent tiles. On eruption it gives low yields and is most likely to damage improvements and buildings. Infrequently erupts, but is always active.

Two tile impassable natural wonder. It provides +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold to adjacent tiles, and Fresh Water.
